DOC.brief_summary: Activation G protein-coupled receptor GPR119 stimulate glucagon-like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) release intestinal L-cells . Previously , administration 2-oleyl-glycerol ( 2-OG ) human significantly increase plasma GLP-1 . In present study want test effect patient type 2 diabetes . The hypothesis expect find significant increase plasma GLP-1 follow meal contain 2-OG compare meal contain olive oil carbohydrate alone .
DOC.detailed_description: Activation G protein-coupled receptor GPR119 stimulate glucagon-like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) release intestinal L-cells . Previously , administration 2-oleyl-glycerol ( 2-OG ) human significantly increase plasma GLP-1 . In present study want test effect patient type 2 diabetes . The hypothesis expect find significant increase plasma GLP-1 follow meal contain 2-OG compare meal contain olive oil carbohydrate alone . The aim study elucidate effect 2-OG , 'diet oil ' GLP-1 secretion patient type 2 diabetes explain mechanism behind known stimulation GLP-1 release dietary fat .
